titles.title: Expressing support for the recognition of October 30, 2022, as the International Day of Political Prisoners.
Expressing support for the recognition of October 30, 2022, as the International Day of Political Prisoners.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution supports recognizing the International Day of Political Prisoners and continuing efforts to raise awareness and secure the release of political prisoners.
